page.title: 18Transport in the area
page.content: Transport in rural areas is difficult. Stations are closing and bus servises are being cut to as few as possible. Unless you drive your own car it is very difficult to get around. A bus picks up some of our school children each day but some of them now have to pay.Travel is free for under eight who live more than two miles fr- om school and over eights who live more than three miles away. The settle to Carlisle railway pas- ses through our block and is in danger of being closed down.Local people are running a campaign to stop this happ- ining.There are no stations in our bl- ock. The rivers in the block are not us- ed for transport but there are three old mills. Jet aircraft practicing low flying and night flying cross our block.
